level.heading: Penalty.
level.text: Any person who shall violate or aid and abet in violating any of the provisions of § 43-120 shall, upon conviction thereof by competent judicial authority, be punished, for each offense, by a fine of not more than $200, or by imprisonment for not more than 90 days, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-34
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-34, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 43-119.
